law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Appropriation act" means:
the State budget; or
a supplementary appropriation act.
"Program" means a brief statement in an appropriation act of the purpose for which an appropriation shall be used.
"Warrant" means a warrant that the Comptroller, the Chief Deputy Comptroller, or a deputy comptroller issues for the disbursement of money from the State Treasury.
